reviews.review: Ein Spiel welches viel mit Logik zu tun hat und eine gute Grafik noch dazu.

Никогда не любил головоломки и игры с загадками. Но это пример того, как нужно делать игры. Она захватывает с первых минут обучения. И даже самые сложные комнаты проходишь просто чтобы узнать, что будет дальше по сюжету.
this game is so well written and its incredibly funny i recomend this game to anyone who loves puzzels
A really satisfying game, and a great sequel to Portal
Valve keşke oyun yapmaya devam etseydi.
最适合与基友愉快玩耍的益智合作游戏，操作简易，上手不是很难，但不得不说，主线有些关卡真的挺烧脑筋，更别说其他玩家制作的第三方地图直接突破天际，但正是这些需要紧密思考和完美配合的玩法恰恰就是这游戏的精髓啊。不多说，只要你有基友，这游戏一定值得推荐。
Excellent game play, beautiful graphics. This game proves that you don't need tons of features and complex mechanics to make an interesting game.
Я такой х*йни в жизни не встречал
Super gra logiczna ze świetną fabułą
Excellent game, very entertaining story and the physics  were crazy, i like it very much and will play it again soon.

Великий Portal 2.... Игра пройдена полностью и если ты не играл, то тебе друг, я советую поиграть в неё!
10 из 10 порталов
Its portal man,what else do you need to like it?
I think it's a really nice game. Worth the play :)

这个游戏强烈建议。但是如果玩的话建议是玩一下传送门1，否则直接玩传送门2的话，可能有一些生疏。这个游戏的剧情和设定都非常的好，到了后面可能就有一些烧脑，但是还行，细细想一下还是能出来的。

另外，对3D晕的话就不用玩这个了。无福享受这个游戏了。

如果给一个评分的话，这个游戏评价是满分...
один портал под себя другой в туалете и всё можно стримить 24\7
its fun..... thats all im gonna say
Excelente juego. Altamente recomendable comenzar por el Portal 1 primero.

I'd honestly say that this is god-like by considering that there are limits straying to the story-line once more, More things to do in this amazing game like co-op or maybe workshop maps? well technically speaking the workshop maps ain't a game mode isn't it... but what-ever it may be. It would be a damn shame if they are trying to ruin it. And also one more thing.  and you all are great people whether you're interested or not interested whatsoever! (except criminals)

Great story and a lot of fun. Found it really funny. Puzzles were hard at times, but it was great when I did complete them. (I hope they make a third game)
игра в принципе не плохая сюжет реалиастичный советую
Hİkaye bakımından oyun çok güzel 2 kez oynayıp bitirdim keşke 3 de olsa oynasak diyebiliceğiniz bir oyun bence alın parasını sonuna kadar hakeden oyunlardan bir tanesi daha

This game was incredible, I had really loved the many different puzzles with different ways to solve them. I only wish that I had more friends that owned the game for the co-op. I haven't found any game breaking bugs and the story line is awesome. This is a massive step up from the original portal game with improved graphics, a longer story and many new puzzles.

Overall this is an incredible game than you can spend a lot of time on and play year after year. If you enjoy puzzles I would definitely recommend this game to you and your friends.

10/10
Awesome design. Witty narration. Kinetic challenges that never get boring, but ramp up in fiendish complexity and counterintuitive imagination.
Excellent puzzles, really good coop play, the humor is an extra bonus.

I can't express enough how good the game is, from the incredible puzzles, to the amazing game physics, to the humorous and funny robots. GLaDOS and Wheatly, they make me feel like I'm having a conversation with real people, I haven't tried the mic feature, I don't even know if it's a feature or not. but the game is an absolute 10/10.

haven't tried the first one yet, will go ahead and buy and try it!
Portal 2 is an awesome game, epic story, intuitive gameplay, must have game on Steam
